topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/558c0570636872138d0001a8#post_558c0570636872138d0001a8
That's because G-Man is an old person in a suit with his wrinkled face.
Old people in video games are always scary.

Slenderman is an unknown entity in a suit.
An entity without an image. No features than distinguishes him from anything. Basically, the original being.
Heck, I could call Slenderman a woman and I can't even tell.

...
